NegativeAdjectives.definition: Someone who might have certain plant sympathies
Someone who has certain fungal characteristics.

PositiveAdjectives.definition: Someone who is calm and collected.
A cool dood/thing, derived from killing fungal infectors.
Artificial or man-made, less susceptible to fungal infections.

NegativeVerbs.definition: Having and nurturing a potted plant.
An excursion to a deadly nature site.
Developing empathy towards invasive plant species.

PositiveVerbs.definition: The act of mass extinguishing deadly or invasive species.
The act of using salt to protect secured areas from plant species.
Going on a bender with antimycotic-laced drinks.

NegativeObjectNouns.definition: A grenade that dispenses a fog of fungal spores.
A substance that hevily promotes plant growth.
botanic hormone matrix, promotes plant growth and sympathies.

NegativePersonNouns.definition: A fungus that causes various changes in mammalian behaviour.
An infected person that attempts to infect others.
An alien organism, similar to a venus flytrap, mainly targets people.

PositiveObjectNouns.definition: An easy to use, self-defence weapon against plant material.
A sword with a blade made of salt, useful against plants.
A substance effective against fungal infections or colonies.

PositivePersonNouns.definition: Someone who uses various flammable substances to kill invasive species.
Someone who is deathly afraid of plants, even harmless earth species.
A person who uses large quantities of salt to keep nature at bay.
